page.title: 06LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: In Etwall there are many different activities for adults and children. Some of the ones for children are Guides for 1O until 15's, Brownies for 7 to 1O years old and Rangers for 15 and up for girls, and Cubs for 8 'til 11 and then you can choose between Cadets and Scouts for boys. There is a youth club for boys and girls. There are also activities for adults, there are bowls, cricket and we have tennis courts to play tennis on. In John Port there is a swimming pool which is open to the public. There are also night clubs and day classes. Those who wish to learn anything, from keep fit to computers, but for things like the theatre, cinema and rollerskating you have take a trip to Burton or Derby.
